name: Mirage in Darkness: Refugee
description:
Game Play Time : 10 ~ 20 mins

Jump, Climb , Dodge , Push and SURVIVE!

2D puzzle platformer adventure game with a story and a bit of an eerie twist.

Controls:

WASD / arrow keys: move
Space: jump
V: choose option / action
C: item menu

You play as Del, a young kid who will jump, climb, crouch, solve puzzles and make decisions along the way as well as... whine and cry about his predicament.

Help him grow up and learn to survive on his own! Sometimes it will be all about timing, other times he will have to use his brains.
